doc:
Gabriel Macht https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gabriel_Macht 0 Gabriel Macht (born January 22, 1972) is an American actor and film producer. Macht is known for playing The Spirit in the eponymous 2008 film adaptation, and for his role as Harvey Specter on the USA Network series Suits. Gabriel_Macht ( born January_22_,_1972 ) is an_American_actor_and_film_producer . Macht is_known for playing The_Spirit in the_eponymous_2008_film_adaptation , and for his_role as Harvey_Specter on the_USA_Network_series_Suits .
